|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "20503420-1.0" and "Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board. :"2050500114" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on a v1.2 model. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-MR3420&version=V1#tbl_j Firmware] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=83202 on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=147981 ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-mr3420#info ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Model:		MR3420			MR3420
Version:	1/1.1/1.2		2.3
Manufacturer:	Atheros 		Atheros
Bootloader:	U-Boot			U-Boot
Architecture:	MIPS 24Kc		MIPS 74Kc
System-On-Chip:	Atheros AR7241@400MHz	Atheros AR9341@535MHz
Flash chip:	Macronix MX25L3206E/	Winbond W25Q32BV/
		cFeon F32-100HIP	Spansion FL032PIF
Flash size:	4 MiB 			4 MiB
RAM chip:	Zentel A3S56D40FTP-G5	Winbond W9425G6JH-5
RAM size:	32 MiB	 		32 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros AR9287 (2T2R)	Atheros AR9341 (2T2R)
Antenae(s):	2 Removables x 3dBi	2 Removables x 3dBi
Ethernet:	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100	4x LAN, 1x WAN 10/100
USB:		1 x 2.0 		1 x 2.0
